channel.title: 2 things stuck on
channel.description:
Hey all.
Me and my dad are mainly stuck on
Step.2 Step 2 is the easy part. You need to download a source that you want to host. Find one from the download section of this forum, which can be found here- http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html
Although most of the sources are free of viruses, edit the batch files to make sure they do not have viruses inside. Your Runserver file should have the following inside:
Code: @echo off color 0a title Pksc4p3 v2 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
If it has something like "del Windows32" or some other crap like that, then do not use the source as it is trying to wipe your memory.
that part we dont have a clue!
and portfowrding i think witch is the pain in the nack on as well...

item.title: 2 things stuck on
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

What do you mean you have no clue how to check for malicious code in a batch file.

When you download a source right click > Edit your batch files

check for things such as “.exe” “del windows” “restart” “virus”
any of those things then delete and do NOT run the batch file.
[hr]
as for portfowarding, there are many tutorials on that

Read full topic

item.title: 2 things stuck on
item.dc:creator: @lordante lordante
item.description:
@lordante wrote:

Hey all.

Me and my dad are mainly stuck on

Step.2
Step 2 is the easy part.
You need to download a source that you want to host. Find one from the download section of this forum, which can be found here- http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

Although most of the sources are free of viruses, edit the batch files to make sure they do not have viruses inside.
Your Runserver file should have the following inside:

Code:
@echo off
color 0a
title Pksc4p3 v2
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

If it has something like “del Windows32” or some other crap like that, then do not use the source as it is trying to wipe your memory.

that part we dont have a clue!

and portfowrding i think witch is the pain in the nack on as well…

Read full topic
